[i](Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When Xie’e Amphitheatre enters the battlefield, search your library for a card and exile it face down, then shuffle. You may cast that card on any turn you sacrificed a permanent.
{B}: [i]Intro: Together[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 0/1 black Cultist creature token with “{1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice three Cultists: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token.”
{2}{B}: [i]Finale: Alone[/i]
Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses life equal to its power and you gain that much life.
